minions.name: Leader Two
minions.description: Talent: One of your other minions gains +2 power until the end of the turn

minions.name: Solarshout
minions.description: Talent: Play an extra action. Give this minion -2 power until the end of the turn

minions.name: Bruiser
minions.description: Ongoing: This minion cannot be destroyed. Talent: This minion gains +2 power and loses its Ongoing ability and all other abilities until the start of your next turn

minions.name: Huffie
minions.description: Talent: Move this minion to another base and give it -1 power until the end of the turn

actions.name: The Touch
actions.description: Play on one of your minions. Ongoing: This minion has the ability: 'Talent: This minion gains +3 power and loses all other abilities until the end of the turn

actions.name: Flighterizer
actions.description: Play on one of your minions. Ongoing: This minion has the ability: 'Talent: Move this minion to another base and give it -1 power until the end of the turn'

actions.name: Change Up and Roll On
actions.description: Special: Before a base scores you may move any number of your minions to there. They each get -1 power until the end of the turn

actions.name: Cesium Armor
actions.description: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion has +1 power and cannot be destroyed

actions.name: Change Into a Gun
actions.description: Play on one of your minions to destroy a minion of power 4 or less there. Ongoing: This minion has -2 power. Destroy this card at the start of your turn

actions.name: Matrix of Bossiness
actions.description: Play on one of your minions. Ongoing: This minion's printed power is treated as if it were 5

actions.name: Form Mergacon
actions.description: Choose a base. Each of your minions there gains +1 power until the end of the turn

actions.name: Passengers
actions.description: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion has the ability: 'Talent: If this minion moved this turn, move another one of your minions from the previous base to here
